Ru_trainchinese: xiě: (глаг) писать; рисовать; сочинять (музыкальное или литературное произведение); описывать, изображать

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A crown was offered to the British royalty museum, but it was only a copy which you could tell by the cheap writing (write) on the side.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "宀" and "舄", the original meaning is displacement and transmission. "Shuowen": "Buy things. From Liu, Laosheng." "Book of Rites-Song Lishang": "Imperial food to the king, the king to give you more, the ware of the irritation does not write, the rest is written." Zheng Xuan's note: " Writer, it is said that the food is the one in one's own utensils." Kong Yingdashu: "Writing is that it is passed down." "Historical Records-Qin Shihuang Benji": "Send Beishan stone coffin, it is written that all the materials of Shu Jing are available."

" Write " also means narration. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧Liaoxiao": "When I see a gentleman, I write in my heart." Zheng Xuanjian: "I write in my heart, and I am comfortable, without any hatred." Zhu Xi's note: "Write, lose and write," I write in my heart without any hatred."

" Write " also means exhaustion. Han Dong Zhongshu's "Spring and Autumn Fanlu-A Journey to Heaven and Earth": "Exhausted stupidly and writes love without pretending to be past, so I am loyal." "Guangya‧ Shigu": "Write, do it."

" Write " is also often used for writing and transcribing. "Hanshu·Yiwenzhi": "(Xiaowu)'s strategy of building a collection of books, and appointing an official to write books.

" Write " can also be used as imitation. "Huainanzi‧ Benjing": "The sound of Lei Zhen can be written with a drum and bell."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "宀" and "舄", the original meaning is displacement and transmission.
humanum_full_description:
從「宀」，「舄」聲，本義為移置、傳送。《說文》：「置物也。从宀，舄聲。」 《禮記‧曲禮上》：「御食於君，君賜餘，器之溉者不寫，其餘皆寫。」鄭玄注：「寫者，傳己器中乃食之也。」孔穎達疏：「寫謂倒傳之也。」《史記‧秦始皇本紀》：「發北山石槨，乃寫蜀荊地材皆至。」

　　「寫」也表示傾述。《詩‧小雅‧蓼蕭》：「既見君子，我心寫兮。」鄭玄箋：「我心寫者，舒其情意，無留恨也。」朱熹注：「寫，輸寫也，我心寫而無留恨矣。」

　　「寫」還表示竭盡。漢董仲舒《春秋繁露‧天地之行》：「竭愚寫情，不飾其過，所以為忠也。」《廣雅‧釋詁》：「寫，盡也。」

　　「寫」亦常用作書寫、謄錄。《漢書‧藝文志》：「（孝武）建藏書之策，置寫書之官。」

　　「寫」還可用作模仿。《淮南子‧本經》：「雷震之聲，可以鼓鍾寫也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「宀」，「舄」聲，本義為移置、傳送。

Chinese: I like to do my writeing while sitting in front of the fire in my house which burns bound up within the brick and mortar fireplace I created.
Meaning: write

Story: A crown was offered to the British royalty museum, but it was only a copy which you could tell by the cheap writing (write) on the side.

從「 宀 」，「 舄 」聲，本義為移置、傳送。《說文》：「置物也。从宀，舄聲。」 《禮記‧曲禮上》：「御食於君，君賜餘，器之溉者不寫，其餘皆寫。」鄭玄注：「寫者，傳己器中乃食之也。」孔穎達疏：「寫謂倒傳之也。」《史記‧秦始皇本紀》：「發北山石槨，乃寫蜀荊地材皆至。」 「 寫 」也表示傾述。《詩‧小雅‧蓼蕭》：「既見君子，我心寫兮。」鄭玄箋：「我心寫者，舒其情意，無留恨也。」朱熹注：「寫，輸寫也，我心寫而無留恨矣。」 「 寫 」還表示竭盡。漢董仲舒《春秋繁露‧天地之行》：「竭愚寫情，不飾其過，所以為忠也。」《廣雅‧釋詁》：「寫，盡也。」 「 寫 」亦常用作書寫、謄錄。《漢書‧藝文志》：「（孝武）建藏書之策，置寫書之官。」 「 寫 」還可用作模仿。《淮南子‧本經》：「雷震之聲，可以鼓鍾寫也。」
From the sound of " 宀" and " 舄", the original meaning is displacement and transmission. "Shuowen": "Buy things. From Liu, Laosheng." "Book of Rites-Song Lishang": "Imperial food to the king, the king to give you more, the ware of the irritation does not write, the rest is written." Zheng Xuan's note: " Writer, it is said that the food is the one in one's own utensils." Kong Yingdashu: "Writing is that it is passed down." "Historical Records-Qin Shihuang Benji": "Send Beishan stone coffin, it is written that all the materials of Shu Jing are available." " Write" also means narration. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧Liaoxiao": "When I see a gentleman, I write in my heart." Zheng Xuanjian: "I write in my heart, and I am comfortable, without any hatred." Zhu Xi's note: "Write, lose and write," I write in my heart without any hatred." " Write" also means exhaustion. Han Dong Zhongshu's "Spring and Autumn Fanlu-A Journey to Heaven and Earth": "Exhausted stupidly and writes love without pretending to be past, so I am loyal." "Guangya‧ Shigu": "Write, do it." " Write" is also often used for writing and transcribing. "Hanshu·Yiwenzhi": "(Xiaowu)'s strategy of building a collection of books, and appointing an official to write books. " Write" can also be used as imitation. "Huainanzi‧ Benjing": "The sound of Lei Zhen can be written with a drum and bell."

寫字的基本解释

寫
xiě

寫
xiè
均见“写”。

寫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiě］
［《廣韻》悉姐切，上馬，心。］
亦作“冩1”。“写1”的繁体字。
(1)移置；输送。
(2)倾吐；发抒。
(3)舒畅；喜悦。
(4)尽，竭。
(5)仿效；模仿。
(6)用模型浇铸。
(7)摹画，绘画。
(8)映照。
(9)描写。
(10)抄写；书写。
(11)写作，创作。
(12)立约租赁。
(13)指订购。
[②]［xiè］
［《集韻》四夜切，去禡，心。］
亦作“冩2”。“写2”的繁体字。
(1)倾泻。
(2)疏泄。中医治疗方法之一。与“补”相对。
(3)通“卸”。把东西解取或搬运下来。
(4)泛指解除，脱卸。
(5)泄漏；泄露。

寫字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页292第04
【唐韻】悉也切【集韻】【韻會】洗野切【正韻】先野切，?音瀉。【說文】置物也。【廣韻】除也，程也。【增韻】傾也，盡也，輸也。【詩·邶風】駕言出遊，以寫我憂。【註】寫，除也。【小雅】我心寫兮。【註】謂我心輸寫，而無留恨也。　又【禮·曲禮】御食於君，君賜餘器之漑者不寫，其餘皆寫。【註】謂萑竹所織，不可洗滌，則傳寫於他器而食之，不欲口澤之凟也。　又洩也。【周禮·地官】稻人掌稼下地，以澮寫水。　又膽鈔也。【古諺】書三寫，魚成魯，帝成虒。　又摹畫也。【史記·秦始皇紀】秦每破諸侯，寫放其宮室，作之咸陽。【註】放，效也。　又鑄像曰寫。【越語】王令工以良金寫范蠡之狀，而朝禮之。【註】謂以善金鑄其形也。　又【集韻】四夜切，音卸。與卸通。【石鼓文】宮車其寫，四馬其寫。【註】舍車解馬也。　又叶舒呂切，音暑。【詩·小雅】旣見君子，我心寫兮。叶上湑下處。　又叶蘇果切，音瑣。【謝惠連詩】有客被褐前，投心自詢寫。臧否固消滅，誰知窮薪火。

寫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
寫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
write
xiě
write
xiè
See also "write".
write
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiě］
["Guangyun" Xijie cuts, mounts, heart. ]
Also known as "冩1". Traditional characters for "write 1".
(1) Displacement; transportation.
(2) Pour; express.
(3) Comfortable; joyful.
(4) Exhaustion, exhaustion.
(5) Imitate; imitate.
(6) Cast with a model.
(7) Copy painting, painting.
(8) Mirroring.
(9) Description.
(10) Copying; writing.
(11) Writing, creation.
(12) Contract lease.
(13) Refers to ordering.
[②]［xiè］
["Ji Yun" four nights cut, go to the 禡, heart. ]
Also known as "冩2". The traditional characters of "write 2".
(1) Pouring.
(2) Dredging. One of the treatment methods of Chinese medicine. Contrast with "complement".
(3) Through "unloading". Unpack or move things down.
(4) Broadly refers to release and release.
(5) Leak; Leak.
write

[Zeng Yun] Pour it out, do it all, and lose it. [Poetry·Bei Feng] Traveling with words to write about my worries. [Note] Write, except also. [Xiaoya] I write in my heart. [Note] It is said that I have lost my heart, but I have no hate.　[Rite·Quli] Yu Shi Yu Jun, you don’t write the one who gave you the Yu Qi, and write the rest. [Note] It is said that the bamboo is woven and cannot be washed. It is written in other utensils and eaten, and it is not intended to be savory.　 vent again. [Zhou Li·Guan Guan] The rice man took the crops down to the ground to write water.　Bold and banknotes. [Ancient proverb] Write three books, Yu Cheng Lu, the emperor Cheng Kui.　Move the picture again. 【Historical Records·Qin Shi Huang Ji】Every time Qin broke the princes, he wrote and placed his palace and made Xianyang. [Note] The effect is also effective.　 Cast an image again and write. [Vietnamese] Wang Linggong wrote Fan Li's state with good gold, while court rituals. [Note] It is said that good gold casts its shape.　[Jiyun] Four nights cut, the sound is unloaded. With unloading through. 【Shiguwen】Gongche's writing, four horses' writing. [Note] It's also a relief from the chariot.　Ye Shu Luqie again, Yin Shu. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Seeing a gentleman, I write in my heart. The upper part of the leaf and the lower part.　 Ye Su fruit cut again, the sound is trivial. [Xie Huilian Poems] Before a guest was browned, he asked himself to write.
